item.title: Exploring the waters of Indonesia aboard Rascal
item.description:
Source: Rascal. Rascal, a refurbished traditional Indonesian Phinisi* yacht outfitted with modern engines, navigation, and entertainment systems, promises the ultimate adventure. Guests enjoy personalized service on board, experiencing renowned Indonesian hospitality amidst chic tropical decor. The removal of Rascal’s mast and sails allows for five ensuite double cabins across two spacious decks. Both indoor and outdoor areas are designed for relaxation. The top deck, soaring 21 feet high, doubles as a diving platform...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/exploring-the-waters-of-indonesia-aboard-rascal/
